short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SGI Salvage bids with some tweaks and improvements.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Why?

I like checking out the SGI Salvage website... a lot, maybe too much. Sometimes I feel it is a bit unwieldy to navigate. I don't have access to the source so I cannot improve it from the server side. This is my attempt to streamline the user experience on the client side (in the browser).

Features

* "Scan mode". A grid of thumbnails of items on bid
* The the summary info for each item in scan mode
* "Bid Now" button on each item to jump to the original tabular view for bidding
